statement: The system shall automatically enter a safe mode and halt movement when a commanded joint speed exceeds safe operating parameters.
The system shall enforce configurable joint range limits through software-level soft stops and hardware-level hard stops.
The system shall display the current position of each joint within its operating range on the operator interface.
The system shall provide colour-coded visual feedback on the operator interface when any joint is approaching its operating limit.
The system shall present operator feedback in a minimal, non-intrusive manner, avoiding information overload during active operations.
The system shall support pre-programmed waypoint navigation, allowing the robot to move autonomously to a specified position on command while the operator monitors.
The system shall provide one-button recall to predefined home or tool-storage positions.
The system shall provide at least one fixed camera view that remains stationary throughout an operation to give the operator a constant spatial reference.
The system shall provide at least one variable camera viewpoint that the operator can reposition during operation.
The system shall support adaptive camera zoom that narrows as the end-effector approaches the target.
The system shall provide an augmented reality alignment overlay on the camera view to indicate target position and required alignment angle, particularly for new tasks.
The system shall display a ghost preview showing the predicted end position of a commanded movement before execution, to give the operator confidence before committing.
The system shall enforce configurable no-go zones that physically prevent the robot from entering areas where it would damage equipment or the environment.
The system shall emit an audible alarm when the robot approaches or enters a defined no-go zone.
The system shall provide force or haptic feedback to the operator, with adjustable sensitivity, so that resistance or misalignment during precision tasks is perceptible.
The system shall prioritise image resolution over frame rate in camera streams used for precision manipulation tasks.
